## 1.1

### Problem 1.1

```{r chapter 1 problem 1.1}
df <- data.frame(
  j = c(14, 15, 16, 22, 24, 25),
  n = c(1,1,3,2,2,5))
df <- df %>% mutate(
  jn = j * n,
  p  = n / sum(df$n))
df <- df %>% mutate(
  jp = j * p,
  j2 = j * j)
ej = sum(df$jp)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj  = j - ej,
  j2p = j2 * p)
ej2p = sum(df$j2p)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj2 = dj * dj)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj2p = dj2 * p)
sdm1 = sqrt(sum(df$dj2p))
sdm2 = sqrt(ej2p - ej * ej)
kable(df, caption = "Summary")
```

## 1.2

### Example 1.2

$$x\left( t \right) = \frac{1}{2} g t^{t}$$

The probability density (Eq. 1.14)

$$\rho\left( x \right) = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{hx}},\left( 0\leqslant x\leqslant h \right)$$

The integral between 0 and h

Confirmed with [Integral Calculator](https://www.integral-calculator.com/)

$$\int_{0}^{h} \rho\left( x \right) dx = \int_{0}^{h} \frac{1}{2\sqrt{hx}} dx = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{h}}\left( 2x^{\frac{1}{2}} \right) \Big|_0^h = \frac{\sqrt{hx}}{h} \Big|_0^h = 1$$

The average distance (Eq. 1.17)

Confirmed with [Integral Calculator](https://www.integral-calculator.com/)

$$\mathbb{E} \left[ x \right] = \int_{0}^{h} x\cdot  \rho\left( x \right) dx = \int_{0}^{h} x\frac{1}{2\sqrt{hx}} dx = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{h}}\left( \frac{2}{3}x^{\frac{3}{2}} \right) \Big|_0^h = \frac{x^{2}}{3\sqrt{hx}} \Big|_0^h = \frac{h}{3}$$

### Problem 1.2

$$\mathbb{E} \left[ x^{2} \right] = \int_{0}^{h} x^{2}\cdot  \rho\left( x \right) dx = \int_{0}^{h} x^{2}\frac{1}{2\sqrt{hx}} dx = \frac{x^{3}}{5\sqrt{hx}} \Big|_0^h = \frac{h^{2}}{5}$$
